entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Orangeville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:44 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.2°C

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. High plus 4. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Freezing rain or snow. High 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early in the morning then changing to freezing rain in the morning then changing to rain showers in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southeast 50 gusting to 80 near noon. High 6. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1.
